title: GFA/PLB awards Gala: Kofi Owusu, Eric Opoku, Ofori vie for GPL MVP
text:
Sports News | 15 October 2015 22:40 CET GFA/PLB awards Gala: Kofi Owusu, Eric Opoku, Ofori vie for GPL MVP - www.allsports.com.gh 
The Premier League Board has announced nominees for this year's Awards ceremony which will be held on Friday, 30th October , 2015 at the La Palm Royal Beach Hotel in Accra. 
Three players, namely Kofi Owusu of Berekum Chelsea, Eric Opoku of Ashgold and Richard Ofori of Wa All Stars will compete against one another for the GPL Most Valuable Player of the season. 
The winner of the most prestigious award last two seasons was Augustine Okrah of Bechem United fame, but now plays for Al Merreikh in the Sudanese league. 
The Awards Ceremony will be to reward and recognize Players, Officials and Clubs who excelled in the 2014/15 edition of the First Capital Plus Premier League. 
Below is the full list of nominees for the 2014/15 GFA/PLB Awards ceremony 
Footballer of the Season1. Kofi Owusu - Berekum Chelsea 
2. Richard Ofori - Wa All Stars 
3. Eric Opoku - Ashantigold
